desc: Recovery. Lifestyle. Attitude. Every day. No Matter What. Clothing for individuals that believe in a 24 hours at a time philosophy. They believe in commitment, integrity, and effort. They know each and every 24 provides an opportunity for growth, no matter how small. They do not give up and keep pushing forward.

layout.text: It is not about where we came from, but where we are going.

24NMW was born out of recovery from past mistakes. There comes a time in our lives when we must rise above our current circumstances. We begin to seek a different way, a better way. We talk with those that have experience with what we struggle with. We begin to read books, watch videos, take notes, and most importantly- apply. The path of changing one's life is different for each individual.
The process is personal. 24NMW simply offers an attitude to live by.
We have come to the conclusion that change often happens slowly over a period of time- each and every day. We commit to a new way of life. Some days are better than others, and many times we must recommit to our goals and desires.
But, one thing is for certain. We shall not give up. We will not fall back on our old ways. We will strive. Ever if we struggle...We will push forward.
EVERY DAY. NO MATTER WHAT!
Mikey B. 24NMW
